name: Beehive
short_desc: Two players compete to fill the the highest amount of hexagons. A solo project to develop an online multiplayer game using Unity Netcode for GameObjects as the multiplayer framework.

name: The Spaceship
short_desc: Two players cooperate to get through a spaceship by solving puzzles without seeing what is on the other player's screen. The game was developed to be played in a public environment using different physical arcade controllers to play.
long_desc: This goes into more detail about what I did in the project

name: Sjungande Phadderister
short_desc: Steer your character by making higher or lower tones with your voice and collect candies. A web game entirely hard coded in JavaScript.
long_desc: This goes into more detail about what I did in the project

name: The Book Recommender
short_desc: A machine learning project to allow web users to write a description for a book they would like to read, upon which the website recommends a set of books to them.
long_desc: This goes into more detail about what I did in the project

name: Board Game Helper
type: Web-based app with board game tools
short_desc: An app that lets users use game tools like rolling dice, flipping a coin, count points, run timers and more.
long_desc: This goes into more detail about what I did in the project

name: Lego Search Website
type: Web-based search tool for lego pieces
short_desc: A website that lets users search for lego pieces and find more information for which lego set they are from.
long_desc: This goes into more detail about what I did in the project
